txt.en: 'Machan is a bold hunter. Perhaps too bold. He vowed to return with the hides of fire-worms from their lairs in Sálgaitë to the south-east, and he has not returned in good time.\n\n'Would you look for Machan, Southron? It may be he is in need of assistance. I will reward you for your efforts....'
'Curse these fire-worms! And curse my boasting. I was a fool to hunt these foul beasts on my own.'
Machan the hunter has gone missing after vowing to return with hides from the fearsome worms of Malenhad.
Machan the hunter should be somewhere in the region of Sálgaitë to the south-east.\n\nThe hunter Murdaigán has asked you to locate Machan, who was hunting fire-worms in Malenhad.
